definition: at the earliest possible time/as soon as possible
and/to reach/up to/in time for
early/morning/Good morning!/long ago/prematurely

sentences.english: That's a long way off but it's not too early to make plans.
sentences.chinese: 尽管来日方长，但是及早打算总没错。

sentences.english: He sent the letter by air mail, so that it might reach them in good time.
sentences.chinese: 我用航空邮件发出这封信，以便他们及早收到。

sentences.english: This is the second half of launching fast.
sentences.chinese: 这是及早出笼的第二部分。

sentences.english: Yes, co-worker 2 is at fault for not getting the project done earlier.
sentences.chinese: 是的，第二个同事没能及早地完成报告是他的过失。

sentences.english: Timely diagnosis and treatment of GDM will reduce the micromia incidence .
sentences.chinese: GDM的及早诊断和及时治疗可使巨大儿发生率降低。

sentences.english: Of course, getting that guidance depends on getting the right diagnosis early on.
sentences.chinese: 当然，得到那样的指导取决于及早得到正确的诊断。

sentences.english: In other words, these two disputing regulations would be better abolished as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，这两项争议的规定，宁及早废止为宜。

sentences.english: Should strengthen the education of high-risk groups, drug rehabilitation as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 应加强对高危人群的宣教工作，及早戒毒。

sentences.english: Making consumer contracts explicit helps us identify such conflicts early.
sentences.chinese: 将消费者契约明确化有助于我们及早发现这种冲突。

sentences.english: Above various spots must completely carry out most early.
sentences.chinese: 以上诸点必须尽最及早执行。

sentences.english: Early rehydration can save the lives of nearly all cholera patients.
sentences.chinese: 及早补液可拯救几乎所有霍乱患者的生命。

sentences.english: Diabetes can be detected early and managed, whether pharmacologically or through diet.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病可以及早发现并通过药物或饮食进行管理。

sentences.english: Book early if you want a good table.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要一张好位子的话，及早去预订。

sentences.english: We booked early to assure ourselves of(getting)good seats.
sentences.chinese: 我们及早订座以保证我们能得到好座位。

sentences.english: An early reply would be appreciated as we wish to reach a prompt decision.
sentences.chinese: 本公司希望能快下决定，故请您及早回复。

definition: as early as possible
ahead of schedule/sooner than planned/to bring forward (to an earlier time)
as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
see 儘快|尽快[jin3 kuai4]
see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
in time/promptly/without delay/timely
to adopt measures/to take steps
to prevent troubles before the event (idiom)/to forestall/to nip sth in the bud
lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to nip in the bud (idiom)
the best policy/the best thing one can do in the circumstances
in order to avoid/so as not to
premature/untimely
to prepare/to make adequate preparation
protective step/protective measure
must/to need to/to be sure to
